trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A> property of a column in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged>引发事件时的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode%2A>属性中的列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控制更改。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The column with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property that changed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> 属性发生更改的列。

trans-unit.source: The previous <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> value of the column's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 列的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> 属性以前的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the column with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property that changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> 属性发生更改的列。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property that changed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn" /> 属性发生更改的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 操作 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the previous value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property of the column.
trans-unit.target: 获取列的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> 属性以前的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> value representing the previous value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> property of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventArgs.Column" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode" /> 值，表示 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.AutoSizeMode" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnModeEventArgs.Column" /> 属性以前的值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或追加到一个多行消息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> named `DataGridView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为`DataGridView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 然后，确保与事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeColumnModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
